member.name: M:AntTweakBar.Tw.AddVarRO(System.IntPtr,System.String,AntTweakBar.Tw.VariableType,System.IntPtr,System.String)
member.summary: This function adds a new variable to a tweak bar by specifying the variable’s pointer. The variable is declared Read-Only (RO), so it could not be modified interactively by the user.
member.param: The tweak bar to which adding a new variable.
The name of the variable. It will be displayed in the tweak bar if no label is specified for this variable. It will also be used to refer to this variable in other functions.
Type of the variable. It must be one of the constants or a user defined type.
Pointer to the variable linked to this entry.
An optional definition string used to modify the behavior of this new entry.

The name of the variable. It will be displayed in the tweak bar if no label is specified for this variable. It will also be used to refer to this variable in other functions.
Type of the variable. It must be one of the constants or a user defined type.
Pointer to the variable linked to this entry.
An optional definition string used to modify the behavior of this new entry.

member.name: M:AntTweakBar.Tw.AddVarCB(System.IntPtr,System.String,AntTweakBar.Tw.VariableType,AntTweakBar.Tw.SetVarCallback,AntTweakBar.Tw.GetVarCallback,System.IntPtr,System.String)
member.summary: This function adds a new variable to a tweak bar by providing CallBack (CB) functions to access it.
member.param: The tweak bar to which adding a new variable.
The name of the variable. It will be displayed in the tweak bar if no label is specified for this variable. It will also be used to refer to this variable in other functions.
Type of the variable. It must be one of the constants or a user defined type.
The callback function that will be called by AntTweakBar to change the variable’s value.
The callback function that will be called by AntTweakBar to get the variable’s value.
For your convenience, this is a supplementary pointer that will be passed to the callback functions when they are called.
An optional definition string used to modify the behavior of this new entry.

member.name: M:AntTweakBar.Tw.AddSeparator(System.IntPtr,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This function adds a horizontal separator line to a tweak bar. It may be useful if one wants to separate several sets of variables inside a same group.
member.param: The tweak bar to which adding the separator.
The name of the separator. It is optional, this parameter can be set to NULL.
An optional definition string used to modify the behavior of this new entry.

member.summary: This function adds a button entry to a tweak bar. When the button is clicked by a user, the callback function provided to this function is called.
member.param: The tweak bar to which adding a new variable.

The callback function that will be called by AntTweakBar when the button is clicked.
For your convenience, this is a supplementary pointer that will be passed to the callback function when it is called.
An optional definition string used to modify the behavior of this new entry.
